price: 87. Oo yeysan kaa jeedin Aayadaha Alle kaddib marka lagagu soo dejiyey, uguna yeedh xagga Rabbigaa, oo ha ka mid noqonnin Mushrikiinta.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddunnaka ʿan āyāti al-lahi baʿda idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
